# https://huggingface.co/ibm-granite/granite-3.0-2b-instruct (Apache 2.0)
if [ ! -f granite-3.0-2b-instruct/granite-3.0-2b-instruct-Q4_K_S.gguf ]; then
    flatpack compress ibm-granite/granite-3.0-2b-instruct --method llama.cpp
else
    echo "Model already exists."
fi

if [ -d "vector" ]; then
    echo "Directory 'vector' already exists. Deleting it now."
    rm -rf "vector"
    echo "Directory 'vector' has been deleted."
fi

echo "Creating 'vector' directory now."

mkdir "vector"

echo "Directory 'vector' created successfully."

BLUE='\033[1;34m'
BOLD='\033[1m'
CYAN='\033[1;36m'
GREEN='\033[1;32m'
NC='\033[0m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'

echo -en "${BOLD}ðŸ’¬ You >${NC} "

while true; do
    if ! read -r INPUT; then
        echo "^D detected, exiting..."
        break
    fi
    
    [ -z "$INPUT" ] && continue
    [ "$INPUT" = "exit" ] && {
        echo "ðŸ‘‹ Goodbye!"
        break
    }
    
    echo -en "\033[s"
    echo -e "${CYAN}Checking memory...${NC}"
    
    MEMORY=$(flatpack vector search-text "$INPUT" --data-dir "vector" --json --recency-weight 1.0 | jq -r ".[] | .text" | perl -e 'print reverse <>' || echo "")

    echo -en "\033[1A\033[K"

    if [ -n "$MEMORY" ]; then
        echo -e "${BLUE}<memory>${NC}"
        echo -e "${GREEN}$MEMORY${NC}"
        echo -e "${BLUE}</memory>${NC}"
    fi

    echo -en "\033[s"
    echo -e "${CYAN}Generating response...${NC}"

    PROMPT="<|start_of_role|>system<|end_of_role|>"
    PROMPT+="You are a helpful assistant.\n"
    PROMPT+="Here is some context to guide your response:\n"
    [ ! -z "$MEMORY" ] && PROMPT+="$MEMORY\n"
    PROMPT+="<|end_of_text|>"
    PROMPT+="\n<|start_of_role|>user<|end_of_role|>${INPUT}<|end_of_text|>"
    PROMPT+="\n<|start_of_role|>assistant<|end_of_role|>"

    ./build/bin/llama-cli \
        -m "granite-3.0-2b-instruct/granite-3.0-2b-instruct-Q4_K_S.gguf" \
        -n "$TOKENS" \
        -p "$PROMPT" \
        -b 32 \
        --ctx_size 1024 \
        --mlock \
        --no-display-prompt \
        --repeat_penalty 1.1 \
        > output.txt \
        2>log.txt

    RESPONSE=$(cat output.txt | \
        awk NF | \
        sed -E 's/<[^>]*>//g' | \
        tr '\n' ' ' | \
        sed 's/^[[:space:]>]*//g' | \
        sed 's/[[:space:]]*$//g' | \
        sed 's/^:\s*//g' | \
        sed 's/\s*:$//g' | \
        sed 's/\[end of text\]//g' | \
        tr -s ' ' | \
        sed 's/> *//' | \
        sed 's/^ *//g' | \
        sed 's/ *$//g')

    if [ -n "$RESPONSE" ]; then
        echo "$RESPONSE" > output.txt
        
        flatpack vector add-texts "User: ${INPUT}\nAssistant: ${RESPONSE}" --data-dir "vector" >/dev/null 2>&1
        
        echo -en "\033[1A\033[K${YELLOW}<assistant>$RESPONSE</assistant>${NC}"
    fi
    echo -en "\n${BOLD}ðŸ’¬ You >${NC} "
done
